# f5distributedcloud_client_connection_limit (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_client_connection_limit` resource manages Client Connection Limits in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Client Connection Limits define connection restrictions and circuit breaker settings.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_client_connection_limit" "example" {
  name                 = "api-conn-limit"
  namespace            = "my-namespace"
  max_connections      = 10000
  connection_timeout   = 60
  enable_circuit_break = true
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `max_connections` (Number) Maximum number of client connections allowed.
- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `connection_timeout` (Number) Connection timeout in seconds.
- `description` (String)
- `enable_circuit_break` (Boolean) Enable circuit breaker functionality.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
